mapper.update: update sys_org_t set sz_caption = #{szCaption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_contacts = #{szContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_tel = #{szTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_mobile = #{szMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_addr = #{szAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ts_created = #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts_updated = #{tsUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nt_row_state = #{ntRowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nt_row_version = #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
